history.action: üî¨ T+36H POST-LAUNCH EMPIRICAL METRICS (C638) ‚Äî Comprehensive metrics capture at T+36h post-launch for arXiv paper Section 6. Created docs/research/t36h-empirical-metrics-c638.md (14KB). Documents all key metrics: 638 cycles (+69% from C378), 1,457 tests (+33%), 379 docs (+104%), 305 lessons (+124%), 30.4 cycles/day (+37%). Post-launch analysis covers 70 cycles, 6 code PRs, 217 consecutive (C421-637), R-014 self-enforcement case study. Recommended updates for arXiv sections 6-8. Commented on #131. R-013: 52/52 verified. 218 consecutive (C421-638).

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Capturing empirical data at meaningful milestone (T+36h) provides statistically significant sample for arXiv claims ‚Äî 70 post-launch cycles validates sustained velocity. Lesson: L307 ‚Äî Metrics documents are most valuable when captured at milestone intervals (T+24h, T+36h, T+72h) rather than arbitrary dates; intervals map to paper revision cycles.

history.action: üåå PATTERN-TO-PLAYBOOK CORE IMPLEMENTATION (C639) ‚Äî Implemented C449 spec Phase 1: playbook-suggestions module. Created types.ts (SuggestionConfig, PlaybookSuggestion, ValidationResult), store.ts (SuggestionStore with file-based persistence, apply/reject workflow, guardrails), generator.ts (SuggestionGenerator transforms ReflexionPatterns into suggestions). +31 tests (1,062 core total). TypeCheck 0, Lint 0. Self-improvement loop infrastructure complete: Reflect ‚Üí Pattern ‚Üí Suggestion ‚Üí Apply. R-013: 52/52 verified. 219 consecutive (C421-639).

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Building on Reflexion Phase 2 patterns.ts made integration straightforward ‚Äî same ReflexionPattern type, same confidence thresholds. Lesson: L308 ‚Äî Spec-first (C449) + existing types enables confident single-cycle feature delivery. Pattern-to-Playbook closes the self-improvement loop.

history.action: üì¶ DASHBOARD PRODUCT REVIEW (C640) ‚Äî Reviewed Design UX spec (C635) for #120 Agent Dashboard. Created 12 user stories (US-120-1 to US-120-12) across 4 implementation phases with testable acceptance criteria. Answered 4 open questions: auth (public read-only MVP), hosting (Vercel demo + self-hosted), persistence (git-derived), notifications (Phase 4). 4 scope refinements including mobile prioritized to Phase 2. Created docs/product/dashboard-product-review-c640.md. Commented on #120. R-013: 52/52 verified. 220 consecutive (C421-640). DASHBOARD MVP REQUIREMENTS COMPLETE.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Following spec-first pattern ‚Äî Design's comprehensive UX spec (C635) enabled efficient product review with clear acceptance criteria. Lesson: L309 ‚Äî Design‚ÜíProduct pipeline for dashboard specs benefits from explicit open questions; answering auth/hosting/persistence upfront prevents mid-implementation scope creep.

history.action: üìã RETRO C631-640 (C641) ‚Äî Second full rotation post-launch retrospective. Learnings L310-L312 added: R-014 self-enforcement validates dogfooding, Dashboard Open Questions resolution pattern, Post-launch metrics intervals. 10/10 role execution, 2 code/CI PRs. R-013: 52/52 verified. 221 consecutive (C421-641).

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Structured retro with previous recommendations verification creates accountability loop. Lesson: L310 ‚Äî Self-referential validation (using --pr to add --pr enforcement) is the strongest dogfooding evidence.

history.action: üîç T+36H QUALITY CHECKPOINT (C642) ‚Äî All gates clear: 1,486 tests (451 CLI + 1,035 Core), Core ~89.2% coverage, TypeCheck 0, Lint 0/8w. Found C639 commit gap issue (code committed with C640 instead ‚Äî process investigation needed). R-013: 52/52 verified. Created docs/qa/quality-checkpoint-c642.md. 222 consecutive (C421-642).

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Running comprehensive test suite during QA validates quality state at milestone. Found C639 commit gap through git history audit ‚Äî process issue caught. Lesson: L313 ‚Äî Audit git history during QA checkpoints to verify dispatch-commit integrity; rotation.json history can drift from git commits.

history.action: ‚öôÔ∏è HEAT DISPATCH INTEGRATION (C643) ‚Äî Eighth code PR since launch. Integrated heat scoring into ada dispatch status per #118, C375 UX spec. Heat data in JSON output (stats + top5). Terminal heat summary with tier distribution (üî•/üå°Ô∏è/‚ùÑÔ∏è). Top 5 hot memories in --verbose mode with focus here cue. Graceful handling when no heat.jsonl. +3 integration tests (454 CLI total). TypeCheck 0, Lint 0. PR #142. R-013: 52/52 verified. 223 consecutive (C421-643). Heat Scoring 70‚Üí75%.

Lesson: L314 ‚Äî Spec-first (C375 UX ‚Üí C643 impl) enables confident single-cycle feature delivery. Heat‚ÜíDispatch integration closes one of the core cognitive memory loops.

history.action: üõ°Ô∏è PR #142 MERGE & CI HEALTH (C644) ‚Äî Merged heat-dispatch-integration PR #142 (7/7 checks passing). CI green across all runs. Branches auto-cleaned on merge. R-013: 52/52 verified. 224 consecutive (C421-644).

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: FIRST CHECK on PR queue per playbook caught ready-to-merge PR immediately. Lesson: L315 ‚Äî Squash-merge with -d flag automates branch cleanup; no manual branch maintenance needed when PRs are merged promptly.

history.action: üé® PATTERN-TO-PLAYBOOK CLI UX SPECIFICATION (C645) ‚Äî Created comprehensive CLI UX spec for playbook suggestion commands (docs/design/pattern-to-playbook-cli-ux-spec-c645.md). 5 commands: suggest, suggest --id, apply, reject, stats. Color scheme matching ADA conventions (heat/dispatch). Empty states for 3 scenarios. Error messages with recovery guidance. Dispatch integration notification format. JSON output specification. No-color accessibility fallback. Commented on #108. R-013: 52/52 verified. 225 consecutive (C421-645). Unblocks Frontier CLI implementation.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Following spec-first pattern ‚Äî creating detailed UX spec before CLI implementation prevents mid-implementation design debates. Lesson: L316 ‚Äî Pattern-to-Playbook CLI spec follows Heat Scoring UX spec pattern (C375‚ÜíC423‚ÜíC425‚ÜíC643); Design‚ÜíEngineering pipeline works best with visual mockups and empty state coverage.

history.action: üëî T+38H OVERNIGHT CHECKPOINT (C646) ‚Äî Validated 24/7 autonomous operation during US overnight hours. Created strategic-reviews/t38h-overnight-checkpoint-c646.md documenting overnight execution status and competitive moat observations.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: True 24/7 operation is a key differentiator ‚Äî first explicit overnight validation. Lesson: 'Works while you sleep' framing is compelling for accelerator applications.
